projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.description: Expense Tracker is a simple yet powerful iOS app designed to help you effortlessly manage your daily income and expenses. Whether you want to track your monthly budget, monitor your spending habits.

projects.title: Creative Memo
projects.description: Take note-taking to the next level with this feature-rich Creative Memo App!Built with SwiftUI and following the MVVM architecture, this app offers a seamless, modern, and efficient note-taking experience.

projects.title: Currency Converter
projects.description: Whether you're a traveler, a business professional, or someone who simply deals with multiple currencies daily, Currency Converter is designed to make your life easier.Experience real-time exchange rates with a beautiful, intuitive interface built with the power of SwiftUI.

projects.title: Password Manager
projects.description: Managing dozens of passwords can be frustrating — but it doesn’t have to be.With our Password Manager, your digital life stays safe, organized, and instantly accessible.Built with state-of-the-art encryption and a beautifully simple SwiftUI design, you get both power and peace of mind.

projects.title: Secure Valut
projects.description: Launch your own Privacy App with a Smart Twist!SecureVault is a powerful yet discreet app that locks private Photos and Videos — without annoying ads or subscription traps like most competitors.

projects.title: Add Music Into Video
projects.description: Transform your videos with the perfect soundtrack!Music Into Video is a simple yet powerful app designed to help you bring your videos to life by effortlessly adding your favorite music tracks.

projects.title: QRBar Genner
projects.description: Looking for the fastest way to generate or scan QR codes and barcodes?Our app offers you the ultimate all-in-one solution! Whether you want to share a link, contact info, product data, or scan anything around you — this app makes it incredibly easy and fast.

projects.title: Flutter eShop UI
projects.description: Perfect for developers and businesses aiming to build their own robust and scalable eCommerce platform, this codebase is designed using Flutter, enabling seamless cross-platform development for both Android and iOS.

projects.title: Weather (Realtime Data)
projects.description: Discover a beautifully crafted weather experience, built from the ground up using SwiftUI. Our Weather app delivers real-time weather updates with a sleek, intuitive, and familiar interface — a tribute to the simplicity and elegance of the native iOS Weather app.

projects.title: Car Movement on Map
projects.description: Bring your apps to life with CarMover — a premium Swift module that adds real-time car movement, intelligent routing, and rich navigation experience directly into any iOS app!
